metadata.title: CVE-2018-7540 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.10.x allowing x86 PV guest OSusers to cause a denial of service (host OS CPU hang) via non-preemptableL3/L4 pagetable freeing.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7540` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxencall1 - 4.8.3+comet2+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u5
libxendevicemodel1 - 4.8.3+comet2+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u5
